readability_reflection: I tried going from left to right and eliminating the answers which failed to follow the concatenation rules
comprehension_debugging: I was not able to do it that quickly. Some of the longer ones did confuse me.
preference_rationale: I would use string interpolation because it is easier for me to substitute a variable directly into my overall string.
learning_curve: It impacted because I was not used to seeing so many variable names placed in concatenation strings.
suggestions_improvement: Yes, if you use interpolation, name the function or variable accordingly so the string can still be understood as its read.
